meanings.definition: Of or relating to language or linguistics.
meanings.sent1: Her linguistical skills helped her ace the language test.
meanings.sent2: The linguistical analysis of the text revealed interesting patterns.
meanings.sent3: The linguistical debate between the two professors was both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His linguistical prowess was unmatched in the field of phonetics.
meanings.sent5: The linguistical nuances of the dialect were fascinating to study.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to language or linguistics.
meanings.sent1: She spoke linguistically during the presentation to ensure clarity.
meanings.sent2: The students listened linguistically to the lecture on syntax.
meanings.sent3: He typed linguistically fast, impressing his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The information was shared linguistically across different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The translator worked linguistically to convey the meaning accurately.
